こんにちは！Harvey & Leiです。私達は旅行、料理、子供好きのご夫婦です。20数年前私達は国際留学生として京都に留学に来まして、その後京都で就職、結婚、出産し長年京都で生活していました。仕事関係で現在のビジネスベースは東京ですが、住まいは横浜です。Leiは旅行及び国際関係学の修士課程を専攻していました。旅行会社に勤めた経験もあり、今まで各国の観光客を案内してきました。 Harveyは経営学の修士を取得後、日本の大手企業で管理職を勤めていました。二人とも旅行が大好きで、この国とこの国の文化を愛していて、是非日本の文化、景色、グルメなどを世界中の人々に紹介したいと思って、二人が決心して仕事をやめ、自分達の旅行ビジネスを立ち上げました。宿泊体験は旅行の中で非常に重要な部分だと思います。我々は清潔、快適、安全、優雅な宿泊施設を提供し、また現地の文化をも取り入れ、お客様の立場に立って細かな対応をすることで、お客様に現地の文化や風習を理解して頂き、ユニークな宿泊体験を頂くことを期待しております。

Hi, we are Harvey and Lei, a couple who love travelling, cooking. We also love children. Twenty years before we came to Kyoto, Japan as international students. Thereafter we worked, got married and had kids in Kyoto. Currently we are living in Yokohama but working at Tokyo. 

Lei’s major study was Travel and International Relationship. After graduation from university Lei worked as an independent tourist guide to help hundreds of tourists worldwide. Harvey worked as a senior managing officer in a major company. As we like travelling, we have loved this country and its beautiful and unique culture. We have a dream for many years, that is to help tourists know more about Japanese culture, scenery and gourmet. Eventually we decided to quit our jobs and establish our own travel business.

We fully understand that accommodation plays an important role in travelling. It can also help foreign tourists to know more local culture and customs. Our place is a kind of Japanese ‘home-style’ hotel with clean, safe, comfortable and elegant environment. Staying with us, you will feel home sweet and safe after a tired day tour.

We look forward to creating the most memorable stay for you during your time in Japan.

I keep the tradition and culture of Sento. 
 When I have free time, I go travelling abroad and have been to around thirty countries. I speak little English, but I've travelled alone a lot and I managed it on my own. I love sports. I am recently into surffing and used to be a professional MMA(Mixed Martial Arts) wrestler in Japan. I really like to talk to people, especially those from overseas, who have different bacgrounds from us.
